history.text: hi
Hi have you seen How to Train Your Dragon?
No, I never have.  Did you see it recently?
Yes I watched it last night with my kids.
Did you like it?  Did your kids like it?
Its a dreamworks animated film starring Jonah Hill, T.J. Miller, and Gerard Butler.
I like Jonah Hill.  Was it good?
Yes I loved it, and the kids loved the dragons, and the all the Ariel Battles.
What are Ariel Battles?
Oops aerial battles are battles that take place in the air. In the case of this movie. Dragons have fights in the air.
I see.  Do you think this movie would be interesting for a date with my wife?
I think if your wife likes Animated comedies then she will really like this one. Toothless (the main dragon) is adorable and my wife really loves him.
Is it in theaters or can you watch it at home?
Its usually on Netflix but It came out in 2010 so its no longer in Theatres.
Is there singing in the movie?  Or is it just talking?
Its not a musical just a standard fantasy.
And is it a comedy or a drama?
It is a comedy with some dramatic elements. Alot of father son relationship building.
Interesting. Do you watch a lot of other animated comedies?  Do you think it was better than Cars or Toy Story?
I think it was definitely better than Cars and I think it was better than Toy Story 2 and 3, but not better than Toy Story
Wow, sounds like a very good movie.  Is it long or short?
Its the perfect length for a childrens movie at just over 90 minutes
Which company produced the movie?  Dreamworks?

Yea its probably Dreamworks best movie since the first Shrek Movie. Its all about VIkings on the Island of Berk in a world where dragons are real. The main character is Hiccup a young scrawy Viking son of the chief Viking Stoic the Vast. Hiccup ends up befriending a dragon and changing the way Vikings view dragons in their world.
Wow, I liked shrek a lot.  What role did Jonah Hill play?  I like him a lot.
He is one of the first people to help Hiccup train dragons. A cocky kind of comic relief character.
So it sounds like you would highly recommend the movie?
I would absolutely. It is one of my favorite fantasy movies.
Is there anything you would say was bad about the movie?
Just that is has a 98% on rotten Tomatoes and a CinemaScore of an A
That sounds really good, not bad.  Right?
Yea those are excellent scores.
Well, that sounds amazing.  What was the name of the movie again?
How to Train Your Dragon
Well that's pretty cool.  So it's on Netflix right now?

I just checked, and I guess its not
s
sorry
Oh, I'll find some other way to watch it.  And what is the rating? PG?
I think so but my 3 year old has watched it nightmare free.
Well, thank you for the recommendation.  I'll definitely check it out!
Bye!
Bye

uid2response.feedback: I did not get the document.  The other user responded relatively quickly and seemed to like the movie a lot!  Even though he didn't quite answer my questions perfectly.  Seems like a great movie that I want to watch!
